thread.title: Spotify's Top 10 most viral tracks
thread.title_full: Spotify's Top 10 most viral tracks - The Denver Post

author: The Associated Press
title: Spotify's Top 10 most viral tracks
text:
The following list represents the most viral tracks on Spotify, based on the number of people who shared it divided by the number who listened to it, from Friday July 24, to Thursday, July 30, via Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and Spotify.
UNITED STATES
1. Roman Scott, Dean Curtis, "Hold This Down (feat. Dean Curtis)" (Roman Scott)
2. Transviolet, "Girls Your Age" (Epic Records)
3. Frame, "In Vain" (Silverstag)
4. James Hersey, "Coming Over - filous Remix" (Ultra Records)
5. Jo Goes Hunting, "Act of Leaving" (Grand Douche Records)
6. Nvdes, "Unforgettable" (Free Laundry)
7. Wes Walker, Dyl, "Jordan Belfort (feat. Dyl)" (Wes Walker)
8. Clairity, "DNA" (Republic Records)
9. Kurt Vile, "Pretty Pimpin" (Matador Records)
10. Donnie Trumpet & The Social Experiment, "Sunday Candy" (Donnie Trumpet & The Social Experiment)
UNITED KINGDOM
1. Kuana Torres Kahele, Napua Greig, James Ford Murphy, "Lava" (Disney Enterprises, Inc./Pixar)
2. Tazer, Tink, "Wet Dollars" (Black Butter)
3. Bring Me The Horizon, "Throne" (Sony Music Entertainment UK Limited)
4. Xo Man, "Pull It To The Side" (XOMAN)
5. Foals, "Mountain At My Gates" (Warner Music UK Ltd.)
6. Mel√©, "Ambience" (Lobster Boy)
7. Lawrence Taylor, "Bang Bang" (Lawrence Taylor)
